Dead by Daylight is a game I have invested a fair amount of time into. One of the glaring issues me for the game has always been the grind, every time there was update the grind would increase exponentially. Imagine my excitement when a new update promises to address this issue that has persisted for YEARS! Now imagine my surprise when all the grind did was eliminate it for those of us who have already played the game ad nauseam. The update has been even more exasperated for new players, for a game in desperate need of new players and life into the game this has been a huge blunder. I'm not touching this game with a ten-foot pole until Behaviour actually listens to its major voices in the community and demonstrates a level of understanding a developer of this level should.

eww, why is this in my library? still waiting on the update that gives survivors gameplay. all they do is run around like mice and "do gens". what that means is you find a generator and hit space on time in a quick-time event. this is probably more exciting than the rest of the gameplay, tbh. just run away from the killer and try to extend the distance between you and him/her by cutting corners 0.1% more efficiently, or maybe flipping a conveniently placed wooden pallet.

if you like the idea of video games, but don't like playing them, and love cheap pop culture references, then you'll love this game!
I don't recommend after the last update

Bana korku temasını sevdiren oyun, özellikle lisanslı karakterlerin filmlerini izledikten sonra oynaması ayrı keyifli. Benim fikrim  DLC almadan oyunun içine girmeniz biraz zor çünkü oyunda para biriktirmesi kolay değil ve ücretsiz gelen karakterler sıkabiliyor. Fakat DLC'ler parasını hak ediyor, alınır.

dokurwione

首先这次设计师想要将环境改的更好，技能选择更多我表示理解，毕竟不整活的话，只有那几个技能可以用。
但是这次是不是改的有些操之过急？
钢筋咬根自摸直接砍废？为什么不先试试过渡一下呢？黎明杀机还没有到推倒重做的地步吧？
关键是你加强的小技能也不是很好用呀，为什么一定要逼我带娱乐技能呢，本来匹配就很久了我不是来这里逛街谈恋爱的。
治疗的改动更是离谱，我的人物是果冻吗？松开一下进度掉的飞快。
玩杀手时候我直接辣手，油灯，死亡恐惧，人类根本摸不懂，过于离谱了。
最缺德的是这个转生，凭什么我点出来的技能全部都没了？改成一级重新玩你觉得很幽默是吧？玩家几百小时的努力一夜之间全改完，之前转生奖励那么差，技能稀有度和高稀有物品也没多少啊？有多少人舍得把技能洗一下重新点？这个改动是让我最生气的，玩家的努力被你们当成小白鼠，平衡平衡做不好，两边一起挨骂。
真的离谱，更新好那天，我看着以前我点了所有三级技能的角色，现在只有一级技能，我呆了很久。仿佛我的努力都变成了笑话。
这个游戏特别好，体验感也还可以。比较推荐

As both a killer and survivor player, and after 1059 hours, I am deleting the game. They decided to shift the meta and just fucked the game. It's done in my mind, there's no place for solo survivors and no second chance anymore, all that happens is tunneling.... and the devs don't give a fuck. Now the devs just want survivors to fuck themselves, like bruh they just say to the survivors "O you don't have the right" (whoever gets that luv you). Also killer is just easy, you can tunnel and get away with it, borrowed time? wait it out, DS? Just catch up easily. Dead Hard? Just point up, wait the 0.5 seconds take a nice long swing and them and BOOM they are dead, so difficult right? 

I've played this game since 2018. I used to love it. But the devs took that away



Time to find another game to get 1000 hours on.
